text: Andrew G. Vajna (born András György Vajna; August 1, 1944 – January 20, 2019) was a Hungarian-American movie producer. He was born in Budapest. Vajna studied at the University of California, Los Angeles. He was known for his works in Nixon, Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines and Medicine Man. Vajna died at his home in Budapest following a long illness on January 20, 2019, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie producers Category:People from Budapest
title: Andrew G. Vajna
